TopicTitle: Crashes with unknown cause and odd stacktrace

Articles.Content:
Okay, I've had two crashes today with some odd stacktrace, the first time was when I tried to go to spacecenter to reset a kerbal which had gotten stuck in T pose, the second time was when I tried to recover the craft after I had landed. It was while playing a science mode game.

http://sta.sh/0vkdpqvvfsv It has the output log from after the second one, but both output logs that I looked at after the crash had the same error, stacktrace, and the last bit before the error was something about crew roster fix from stock bug fixes. I've removed that module to see if that does anything.

Windows 8.1 64x

KSP 0.90 running 32x

Mods:

FAR

MechJeb

hangars

Better Buoyancy

CSS

B9 aerospace

KAS

KJR

Community Tech Tree

TechManager

Nereids backup system

procedural fairings

universial storage

Stock Bug fix modules

SmartStage

SCANsat

ATM
